about_us_content1: TUK TUK Request is a new Taxi App aimed at equipping Tuk Tuk owners to enter the taxi requesting industry.
about_us_content2: We are offering the most affordable fares for communities. Our Goal is  to empower the youth of South Africa by creating job opportunities.
product_section_para: TukTuk Taxi is best App based taxi service in town.
product_section_1: Your experience is important to us. We never compromise on our standards. Safety regulations are particularly emphasized to ensure peace of mind.
product_section_2: View live tracking, price estimations, and even book ahead of time! We have every avenue covered with every latest technology.
product_section_3: Aside from cash, credit card, payments are PCI DSS compliant. The website has an SSL certification, and the apps are checked by the Apple Store and Google Play.
privacy_policy_para1: TUK TUK Request built the TUK TUK Request app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by TUK TUK Request at no cost and is intended for use as is.
privacy_policy_para2: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
privacy_policy_para3: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_para4: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at TUK TUK Request unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_para6: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Tuk Tuk Request. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.
privacy_policy_para7: The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacy_policy_para8: Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
privacy_policy_para11: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacy_policy_para13: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
privacy_policy_para14: This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacy_policy_para16: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacy_policy_para18: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacy_policy_para20: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
privacy_policy_para21: We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacy_policy_para23: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_policy_para25: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy_policy_para27: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
privacy_policy_para29: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy_policy_para30: This policy is effective as of 2021-02-02
privacy_policy_para32: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at tuktukrequest@gmail.com.
login_validate_error: Email or Password is not correct.

past_booking_error: Ride Later is not avaialable for Past Datetime or within next 15 mins.

name: Name
allow_location: Allow Location for the Realtime Map
title: Title

password_alphaNumeric_check: Password must consists of at least 1 alphanumeric characters and 8-15 length.
password_complexity_check: Password must be atleast 1 small-case letter, 1 Capital letter, 1 digit, 1 special character and 6-10 length.
valid_email_check: Please enter a valid email address.
apple_signin_error: Apple Signin is not set up in developer.appple.com or you have used the same email to signup already.

new_booking_notification: You Have A New Booking Request
estimate_fare_text: This is your Estimate fare only

withdraw_below_zero: Withdraw amount cannot be less than or equal to 0.
withdraw_more: Withdraw amount cannot be greater than Wallet Balance.
mobile_apps_on_store: Mobile Apps available on App Stores
wallet_balance_zero: You Wallet Balance is 0. If you take Payment in Cash, the Admin Convenience Fee will get deducted from Wallet and your Wallet Balance will be in Negative after the Ride. Negative balance will restrict further Rides. You need to Recharge Wallet or Ask Admin for help.
wallet_balance_negative: You Wallet Balance is NEGATIVE. Please recharge your Wallet.
disclaimer_text: This app collects location data to enable 'Search Vehicle Location', 'Travel Route and Navigation', 'Realtime Vehicle Movement', even when the app is closed or not in use.
push_error_1: Failed to get push token for push notification!
push_error_2: Must use physical device for Push Notifications
cancel_reason_2: Cab is not moving in my direction
proper_bonus: PLease enter proper bonus in numbers.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to find the Cabs near you.
NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take your profile picture.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses Photo Library for uploading your profile picture.
user_exists: User with same Email or Mobile number exists.
user_does_not_exists: Mobile Number is not registered. Register User first.
reg_error: Error while Signup. Please check the entered data carefully.
user_issue_contact_admin: No profile data found. Please contact Admin
email_or_mobile_issue: Please check your email id or mobile number. Note: Mobile number should be in International format e.g. +919999888877
